recommended_degree: Teknik Telekomunikasi, Teknik Elektro, Teknik Listrik, Teknik Informatika, Sistem Informasi (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Learning as Site Power Engineer in telecommunications industries, including project delivery process and milestone.
2. Get familiar with telecommunication infrastructure and equipment.
3. Together with mentor to prepare MoP, follow up RFC, or support project Operation.  
4. Daily jobs such as design, troubleshoot electrical power infrastructure, ensuring uninterrupted service for telecommunication facilities.
